item.title: Roar Patriots
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Jaguars would rape those kids. They have terrible run defense, and with a good play-action game, and a tough defense, The Jaguars would win.

item.title: Roar Patriots
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

I knew everyone here wasn’t a fag, I knew someone watched sports.

Anyway, congrats to the Pats. I didn’t think they’d do it, to be honest. Now they just have to keep winning in the playoffs. If they don’t then all of this will of course be for nothing.
